text: Gianfranco Bozzao (3 August 1936 â€“ 24 May 2019) was an Italian footballer. He played as a defender. Bozzoa was born in Venice. He played for Fiorentina, Salernitana, Arezzo, SPAL, Juventus and Piacenza during the 1950s and 1960s. He died in Ferrara in 2019, at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Veneto Category:Sportspeople from Venice
title: Gianfranco Bozzao
